text:
Hi,

Like you can see in https://developers.google.com/speed/docs/insights/Server Google recommends having server response time under 200ms for a web application.

The default value for jmeter.reportgenerator.graph.responseTimeDistribution.property.set_granularity in "Response Time Distribution" is 500ms

I propose to reduce this value to 100ms


Antonio
creator: ra0077@gmail.com
ra0077@gmail.com
text:
New Revision: 1817420

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1817420&view=rev
Log:
Bug 61871 - Reduce jmeter.reportgenerator.graph.responseTimeDistribution.property.set_granularity default value from 500ms to 100ms
